game_description: · In Escape From Dungeon you're one of heros who are sent to save the village. You are required to choose a proper roadmap from 30 different types of dungeons, and take the big boss down in the final level! · Each adventure experience is different based on your option. Multiple choices of weapons and interactive traps are waiting for you. · Player Number: 1 Player · Standing Mode: Stand & play, no space requirement at all. · Walking Mode: 1 player explore every unexpected dungeon free-roaming in a 4x8m space. You need to dodge attacks and find a proper angle to shoot down the monsters. · Features: Shift of multiple weapons brings you totally different free-roaming fight experience, intensive hit feedback + funny monster AI design, allows every player forget reality and totally being highly engaged in the adventure. · Built-in level system, experience random 10 dungeons each adventure, feel more excitement & face more challenge combination each adventure! High playability!
review_1: As this is currently free I thought I'd give it a go. I had no idea what was going on. The movement controls are so weird and need changing. I seem to finish a level and I'm just standing there waiting for something to happen, but nothing does. The game feels unfinished and not ready for release. The only good thing is the gun mechanics which feel great. Shame.
review_2: WASTE OF MONEY. You can beat every enemy by sitting down. They aim above you, making the game as fun as watching grass grow. I also can't refund this despite meeting the refund requirements
review_3: Great fun just played last night.
